video_source.title: BEST MACD Trading Strategy [86% Win Rate]
video_source.author: TradingLab

market_filter: Essentially, this indicator uses moving averages to find trends in the market, and it's pretty damn good at it too
The MACD indicator is insanely good at finding trends and markets

entry_conditions: And finally, we have the zero line, which basically represents the center of the MACD indicator
If they cross and it's above the zero line, you won't want to enter the trade
You only want to enter a short trade if the lines are crossing downward and it's above the zero line
exit_conditions: Now what I like to do is set a stop loss below the 200 day moving average
So the 200 day almost acts as a wall that the price has to break through to hit the stop loss
market_conditions: Essentially, this indicator uses moving averages to find trends in the market, and it's pretty damn good at it too
The MACD indicator is insanely good at finding trends and markets
How you can tell if a chart is about to have an upward trend is by looking for a cross upwards between the MACD line and the signal line
